db:abstract.db:para: A small hybrid application based on the WebEngineView QML type and Qt Quick Controls 2.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += quick qml quickcontrols2 webengine
cross_compile { posix|qnx|linux: DEFINES += QTWEBENGINE_RECIPE_BROWSER_EMBEDDED }
SOURCES += main.cpp
RESOURCES += resources/resources.qrc
# Make sure Qt Quick compiler does not remove the source code of the .js files. QTQUICK_COMPILER_SKIPPED_RESOURCES = resources/resources.qrc
DISTFILES += \ resources/pages/assets/3rdparty/MARKDOWN-LICENSE.txt \ resources/pages/assets/3rdparty/MARKED-LICENSE.txt
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/webengine/recipebrowser INSTALLS += target
